documentation.text:
@dev caller create a new pod.
 Requirements:
 - the caller must MODERATOR_ROLE to perform this action.
 - pod should not exist before.

attributes.text:
@dev caller create a new pod.
 Requirements:
 - the caller must MODERATOR_ROLE to perform this action.
 - pod should not exist before.
